title: Astrochef LLC. Recalls Chicken Pub Style Entrees Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: EDITORS NOTE: - This release is being updated to include the product lot code and a best if used date. WASHINGTON, Sept. 20, 2019 Astrochef LLC., a Rockwall, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 11,475 pounds of frozen chicken pub style entrees labeled as beef pub...
